translations: n.（遗传疾病研究中家系的）渊源者

sentences.sentence: Methods 73 PCOS probands with family history of PCOS were diagnosed according to the PCOS diagnostic criteria.
sentences.translation: 方法按pcos诊断标准确立先证者核心家系73个，在先证者家乡选择正常人及其家系73个作为对照组。

sentences.sentence: No other sarcomere gene mutations identified in the remaining probands caused apical HCM in other family members.
sentences.translation: 并没有在其余的患者发现别的肌节蛋白基因突变以造成其他家庭成员的心尖肥厚型心肌病。

sentences.sentence: Methods 186 T2DM probands and 489 normoglycemic first-degree relatives were selected from 186 T2DM nuclear families.
sentences.translation: 方法选择186个2型DM核心家系中186例2型DM先证者和489例糖耐量正常的一级亲属。
